name: CMS Settings
styles_to_update:
[
  {
    "fieldname": "background-btn",
    "label": "Background For Button",
    "fieldtype": "Data",
    
    "child_properties": [
      
      {
        "fieldname": "background-color",
        "label": "Background Color",
        "fieldtype": "Color",
        "default": "",
        "variable_name":"--go1-button-$-bg"
      },
      {
        "fieldname": "hover-text-color",
        "label": "Hover Text Color",
        "fieldtype": "Color",
        "default": "",
        "variable_name":"--go1-typography-$-htc"
    },
      {
        "fieldname": "background-col-br",
        "label": "",
        "fieldtype": "Column Break"
      },

      {
        "fieldname": "hover-color",
        "label": "Hover Color",
        "fieldtype": "Color",
        "default": "",
         "variable_name":"--go1-button-$-hc"
      },
       {
        "fieldname": "background-col-br",
        "label": "",
        "fieldtype": "Column Break"
      },
      {
        "fieldname": "bg-gradient-color",
        "label": "Pick",
        "fieldtype": "Button",
        "default": "",
         "variable_name":"--go1-button-$-gc",
		"input_class": "btn-default",
		"input_css":{"margin-top": "10px"}
      }
     
    ]
  },
  {
    "fieldname": "background",
    "label": "Background",
    "fieldtype": "Data",
    
    "child_properties": [
    {
        "fieldname": "background_options",
        "label": "Backgroud Option",
        "fieldtype": "Select",
        "default":"Background Defaults",
        "options":["Background Defaults","Background Gradient"]
      },
      {
        "fieldname": "background-image",
        "label": "Background Image",
        "fieldtype": "Attach",
        "depends_on":"eval:doc.background_options == 'Background Defaults'"
      },
       {
        "fieldname": "background-size",
        "label": "Background Size",
        "fieldtype": "Select",
        "options": [
            "",
          "auto",
          "contain",
          "cover",
          "revert",
          "unset"
        ],
        "depends_on":"eval:doc.background_options == 'Background Defaults' || doc.background_options == 'Background Pattern' || doc.background_options == 'Background Mask'"
      },
      {
        "fieldname": "background-col-br",
        "label": "",
        "fieldtype": "Column Break"
      },
       {
        "fieldname": "bg-pattern-color",
        "label": "Pick",
        "fieldtype": "Button",
        "default": "",
         "variable_name":"--go1-button-$-pattern",
         "input_class": "btn-default",
		"input_css":{"margin-top": "10px"},
         "depends_on":"eval:doc.background_options == 'Background Pattern'"
      },
      {
        "fieldname": "bg-mask-color",
        "label":"Pick",
        "fieldtype": "Button",
        "default": "",
         "variable_name":"--go1-button-$-mask",
         "input_class": "btn-default",
		"input_css":{"margin-top": "10px"},
         "depends_on":"eval:doc.background_options == 'Background Mask'"
      },
      {
        "fieldname": "background-color",
        "label": "Background Color",
        "fieldtype": "Color",
        "default": "",
        "depends_on":"eval:doc.background_options == 'Background Defaults' || doc.background_options == 'Background Pattern' || doc.background_options == 'Background Mask'"
      },
       {
        "fieldname": "background-postion-x",
        "label": "Background Postion X",
        "fieldtype": "Select",
        "options": [
            "",
          "center",
          "left",
          "right",
          "unset"
        ],
        "depends_on":"eval:doc.background_options == 'Background Defaults' || doc.background_options == 'Background Pattern' || doc.background_options == 'Background Mask'"
      },
      {
        "fieldname": "bg-gradient-color",
        "label": "Pick",
        "fieldtype": "Button",
        "default": "",
         "variable_name":"--go1-button-$-gc",
		"input_class": "btn-default",
		"input_css":{"margin-top": "10px"},
		"depends_on":"eval:doc.background_options == 'Background Gradient'"
      },
      {
        "fieldname": "background",
        "label": "Background Video",
        "fieldtype": "Attach",
		"depends_on":"eval:doc.background_options == 'Background Video'"
      },
      {
        "fieldname": "background-col-br",
        "label": "",
        "fieldtype": "Column Break"
      },
      {
        "fieldname": "background-repeat",
        "label": "Background Repeat",
        "fieldtype": "Select",
        "options": [
            "",
          "no-repeat",
          "repeat",
          "repeat-x",
          "repeat-y",
          "unset"
        ],
        "depends_on":"eval:doc.background_options == 'Background Defaults' || doc.background_options == 'Background Pattern' || doc.background_options == 'Background Mask'"
      },

      {
        "fieldname": "background-postion-y",
        "label": "Background Postion Y",
        "fieldtype": "Select",
        "options": [
            "",
          "bottom",
          "center",
          "top",
          "unset"
        ],
        "depends_on":"eval:doc.background_options == 'Background Defaults' || doc.background_options == 'Background Pattern' || doc.background_options == 'Background Mask'"
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    "fieldname": "typo",
    "label": "Typography",
    "fieldtype": "Data",
    
    "child_properties": [
  {
    "fieldname": "font-family",
    "label": "Font Family",
    "fieldtype": "Data",
    "variable_name":"--go1-typography-$-f"
  },
   {
    "fieldname": "color",
    "label": "Color",
    "fieldtype": "Color",
    "default": "",
    "variable_name":"--go1-typography-$-c"
  },
   {
    "fieldname": "line-height",
    "label": "Line Height",
    "fieldtype": "Data",
    "variable_name":"--go1-typography-$-h"
    
  },
  {
    "fieldname": "typo-colbr",
    "fieldtype": "Column Break"
  },
  {
    "fieldname": "font-size",
    "label": "Font Size",
    "fieldtype": "Int",
    "allow_units":1,
    "allow_media_query":1,
    "variable_name":"--go1-typography-$-s"
  },
   {
    "fieldname": "text-align",
    "label": "Text Align",
    "fieldtype": "Select",
    "options": [
        "",
      "Left",
      "Center",
      "Justify",
      "Right",
      "unset"
    ],
    "variable_name":"--go1-typography-$-ta"
  },
   {
    "fieldname": "letter-spacing",
    "label": "Letter spacing",
    "fieldtype": "Data",
    "variable_name":"--go1-typography-$-ls",
     "allow_units":1
  },
  {
    "fieldname": "typo-colbr",
    "fieldtype": "Column Break"
  },
  {
    "fieldname": "font-weight",
    "label": "Font Weight",
    "fieldtype": "Select",
    "options": [
        "",
      "100",
      "200",
      "300",
      "400",
      "500",
      "600",
      "700",
      "800",
      "900",
      "bold",
      "bolder"
    ],
    "default": "400",
    "variable_name":"--go1-typography-$-w"
  },
 
 
  {
    "fieldname": "text-transform",
    "label": "Text Transform",
    "fieldtype": "Select",
    "options": [
        "",
      "Uppercase",
      "Lowercase",
      "Capitalize",
      "Inherit"
    ],
    "variable_name":"--go1-typography-$-t"
  },
 
 
  {
    "fieldname": "text-shadow",
    "label": "Text Shadow",
    "fieldtype": "Select",
    "options": [
      "",
      "rgb(149 157 165 / 60%) 0px 8px 24px",
      "rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 0px 10px 50px"
    ],
    "default": "",
    "variable_name":"--go1-typography-$-ts"
  }
]
  },
